summary: Frontend testing completed for Beattribe PWA and upload features. All requested features verified successfully.

PWA_manifest_json_accessible.details: manifest.json returns HTTP 200 with correct PWA configuration (name: Beattribe, display: standalone, theme_color: #8A2EFF)

PWA_sw_js_accessible.details: sw.js returns HTTP 200 with service worker code for caching and offline support

PWA_service_worker_registration.details: Console shows '[PWA] Service Worker registered' message on page load

UI_explorer_les_beats_removed.details: 'Explorer les beats' link is NOT present on homepage (as expected per requirements)

Upload_TrackUploader_visible.details: TrackUploader component with data-testid='track-uploader' is visible in session page

Upload_no_body_stream_error.details: No 'body stream already read' error in console logs. Upload uses Supabase SDK correctly.

CMS_default_settings_fallback.details: useSiteSettings hook uses maybeSingle() and falls back to DEFAULT_SETTINGS if table doesn't exist

critical_code_review_comments: Upload functionality correctly uses Supabase SDK (supabase.storage.from().upload()) instead of fetch API
Trial limit (1 song) is correctly enforced for non-admin users - shows 'Limite de la version d'essai' message
Service worker registration is properly implemented in App.tsx useEffect
context_for_next_testing_agent: All PWA features (manifest.json, sw.js, service worker registration) are working. Upload uses Supabase SDK correctly. Trial users see upload limit message. Admin bypass works for contact.artboost@gmail.com email.
